steps.title: Power on your Xbox 360 gaming console and sign in to Xbox Live.
steps.content: Power on your Xbox 360 gaming console and sign in to Xbox Live.

steps.title: Launch Call of Duty:
steps.content: Launch Call of Duty: Black Ops II, and select the option to play in multiplayer mode.

steps.title: Select “Xbox Live,” then select “Store” from the multiplayer menu.
steps.content: Select “Xbox Live,” then select “Store” from the multiplayer menu.

steps.title: Select “Call of Duty:
steps.content: Select “Call of Duty: Black Ops II: Nuketown Zombies” under the section entitled, “Map Packs.”

steps.title: Select “Download,” then select “Confirm Purchase.
steps.content: Select “Download,” then select “Confirm Purchase. ” Nuketown Zombies currently retails for $4.99, but prices are subject to change at any time.

steps.title: Press the Guide button on your Xbox controller and select “Xbox Home.
steps.content: Press the Guide button on your Xbox controller and select “Xbox Home. ” Nuketown Zombies will begin the downloading process after you exit the game. The Guide button is the large “X” button in the center of the Xbox 360 controller.

steps.title: Press the Guide button again, then select “Games and Apps.
steps.content: Press the Guide button again, then select “Games and Apps. ”

steps.title: Select “Active Downloads,” then select “Nuketown Zombies.
steps.content: Select “Active Downloads,” then select “Nuketown Zombies. ” The map will begin downloading to your Xbox 360.

steps.title: Wait for your Xbox to inform you that Nuketown Zombies has been successfully downloaded.
steps.content: Wait for your Xbox to inform you that Nuketown Zombies has been successfully downloaded. After you receive the confirmation message, Nuketown Zombies will be fully integrated with Call of Duty: Black Ops II.

steps.title: Power on your PS3 gaming console and sign in to the PlayStation Network.
steps.content: Power on your PS3 gaming console and sign in to the PlayStation Network.

steps.title: Launch Call of Duty:
steps.content: Launch Call of Duty: Black Ops II, and select the option to play in multiplayer mode.

steps.title: Select “Store” from the multiplayer menu, then select “Call of Duty:
steps.content: Select “Store” from the multiplayer menu, then select “Call of Duty: Black Ops II Nuketown Zombies Add-On.”

steps.title: Select “Add to Cart,” then select “View Cart.
steps.content: Select “Add to Cart,” then select “View Cart. ”

steps.title: Select “Proceed to Checkout,” then select “Confirm Purchase.
steps.content: Select “Proceed to Checkout,” then select “Confirm Purchase. ” Nuketown Zombies currently retails for $4.99, but prices are subject to change at any time.

steps.title: Select “Download All” at the prompt.
steps.content: Select “Download All” at the prompt. Your PS3 will begin downloading Nuketown Zombies.

steps.title: Wait for the download to complete, then select the option to exit the store.
steps.content: Wait for the download to complete, then select the option to exit the store.

steps.title: Close and reopen Call of Duty:
steps.content: Close and reopen Call of Duty: Black Ops II. Nuketown Zombies will now be fully integrated with your game.

steps.title: Launch Call of Duty:
steps.content: Launch Call of Duty: Black Ops II on your PC gaming system.

steps.title: Select the option to play in multiplayer mode, then select “Store.
steps.content: Select the option to play in multiplayer mode, then select “Store. ”

steps.title: Execute a search for “Nuketown Zombies,” or scroll through the content browser to locate the add-on.
steps.content: Execute a search for “Nuketown Zombies,” or scroll through the content browser to locate the add-on.

steps.title: Click on “Add to Cart” next to Nuketown Zombies, and follow the on-screen prompts to complete your purchase.
steps.content: Click on “Add to Cart” next to Nuketown Zombies, and follow the on-screen prompts to complete your purchase. Nuketown Zombies currently retails for $4.99, but prices are subject to change at any time. After entering your payment information, Nuketown Zombies will automatically begin downloading to your computer.

steps.title: Wait for Nuketown Zombies to finish downloading.
steps.content: Wait for Nuketown Zombies to finish downloading. When the download is complete, Nuketown Zombies will be integrated with Call of Duty: Black Ops II.
